select
from tb_rent_ticket where is_deleted = 0
AND (rent_ticket_from like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%' ) or rent_ticket_to like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%' ))
order by id desc
limit #{start},#{limit}
select count(*) from tb_rent_ticket where is_deleted=0
